INSERT INTO saas_menu_resource ( res_name, res_parent_url, res_url, create_date ) VALUES ( #{resName}, #{resParentUrl}, #{resUrl}, #{createDate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_menu_resource
res_name = #{resName},
res_parent_url = #{resParentUrl},
res_url = #{resUrl},
create_date = #{createDate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_menu_resource
res_name = #{map.resName},
res_parent_url = #{map.resParentUrl},
res_url = #{map.resUrl},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_menu_resource ( res_name, res_parent_url, res_url, create_date ) VALUES ( #{map.resName}, #{map.resParentUrl}, #{map.resUrl}, #{map.createDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_menu_resource
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND res_name like CONCAT('%', #{resName} , '%')
AND res_parent_url like CONCAT('%', #{resParentUrl} , '%')
AND res_url like CONCAT('%', #{resUrl} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
